mapper.insert: insert into tbl_purchase (member_id, product_id, pur_name, pur_phone_number, pur_address, pur_address_detail, pur_location, pur_pw, pur_total_price) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{purName}, #{purPhoneNumber} , #{purAddress}, #{purAddressDetail}, #{purLocation}, #{purPw}, #{purTotalPrice})
mapper.select: select p2.product_id, p1.product_name, p1.product_category, p2.pur_id, p2.pur_date, p2.pur_total_price, f.file_original_name, p1.member_id from tbl_product p1, tbl_purchase p2, tbl_file f where p1.product_id = p2.product_id and p2.product_id = f.product_id

select p2.pur_id, p1.product_name, p2.pur_total_price, p1.product_category, f.file_original_name, p2.pur_date, p2.pur_name, p2.pur_phone_number, p2.pur_address, p2.pur_address_detail, p2.pur_location, p2.pur_pw, p2.product_id, p1.member_id from tbl_product p1, tbl_purchase p2, tbl_file f where p1.product_id = p2.product_id and p2.product_id = f.product_id and p2.pur_id = #{purId}
